snippet: James Levine, the conductor who has been away from the podium at the Metropolitan Opera for two years because of health issues, will return to performing in 2013.
abstract: James Levine, conductor and much loved music director of the Metropolitan Opera who has been away from the podium for two years because of health issues, will return to performing in May 2013.
lead_paragraph: James Levine, the conductor who has been away from the podium at the Metropolitan Opera for two years because of health issues, will return to performing in 2013.

headline.seo: James Levine to Return to Conducting in 2013
headline.main: Saying ‘It’s Miraculous for Me,’ Levine Will Conduct Again at Met
headline.print_headline: Saying ‘It’s Miraculous for Me,’ Levine Will Conduct Again at Met
